Song.title: Precious Children
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Joel Sczebel, Meghan Baird, and Abbott Jones Â© 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C2 | Em7 | C2 | Em7]
Verse 1: [C2] Broken and def[Em7]iled Clinging to our f[C2]ilth We gloried in our [Em7]shame Running far from [Fmaj7]You Still Your mercy [Am]sought and [C Csus]saved [G]us
Chorus: Halle[F]lu[C]jah We be[F]long [G]to [Am]You You have [F]washed our [C]stains And have [F]raised us [G]up with [Am]Christ Precious [F]children [G]in Your [C2]eyes [| Em7 | C2 | Em7]
Turn: [||: Am C2 | C2 G :|| (to chorus)]
Verse 2: [C2] You gave Your only [Em7]Son Your joy and Your del[C2]ight You nailed Him to the [Em7]cross You crushed Him for our [Fmaj7]sin How could You love [Am]us{,} like You [C Csus]love [G]Him
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 broken and defiled clinging to our filth we gloried in our shame running far from you still your mercy sought and saved us chorus hallelujah we belong to you you have washed our stains and have raised us up with christ precious children in your eyes turn verse 2 you gave your only son your joy and your delight you nailed him to the cross you crushed him for our sin how could you love us like you love him
